text: Ritterstraße is a through station on the Hamburg U-Bahn line U1. The station was opened in October 1962 and is located in the Hamburg district of Eilbek, Germany. Eilbek is part of the Hamburg borough of Wandsbek. == Service == Wall tiles === Trains === Ritterstraße is served by Hamburg U-Bahn line U1; departures are every 5 minutes. == See also == * List of Hamburg U-Bahn stations == References == == External links == * Line and route network plans at hvv.de Category:Hamburg U-Bahn stations Category:Buildings and structures in Wandsbek Category:Railway stations opened in 1962 Category:1962 establishments in West Germany
title: Ritterstraße (Hamburg U-Bahn station)
